dc_title_s: Biomass Resource Potential in the United States, Summer 2014
dc_description_s: This polygon dataset contains estimates of biomass resource potential for the lower 48 states of the United States. The following feedstock categories are considered for this study: crop residues, methane emissions from manure management, methane emissions from landfills and wastewater treatment facilities, forest residues, primary and secondary mill residues, urban wood waste, and dedicated energy crops. This layer is part of a collection of GIS data for renewable and electric energy in the U.S. This layer is from the 2014 Summer Quarter update (Update 1016).This shapefile can aid in estimating biomass resource availability in counties within the United States.
